fields.name: 1!n activity [nation]
fields.value: Shows when players in a nation were last online.

fields.name: 1!n invitable [nation]
fields.value: Shows what nations can be invited to the specified nation.

fields.name: 1!n list [members|area]
fields.value: Lists nations based on members or area.

fields.name: 1!n online [nation]
fields.value: Shows players online in the specified nation.
